entry.title: Skin Dew Coconut Water Cream (New!)
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 58.00

Description 

Skin Dew Coconut Water Cream helps to combat dehydration and promote balanced, moisture-rich, and healthy-looking skin. This powerful, plant-based formula is crafted with: 

  • Over 50% pure, mineral rich Coconut Water to hydrate and nourish.
  • Cupuacu Butter, a polyphenol-rich moisturizer sourced from the Amazon, to help neutralize free radicals that contribute to premature aging.
  • A clinically proven complex of acacia, jojoba and sunflower to form a protective, breathable film to help lock-in hydration and defend skin against environmental aggressors.

It benefits all skin types and is especially good for dull, dehydrated, and combination skin. Intensely moisturizing, yet surprisingly lightweight, this cream absorbs into the skin within a minute or two and layers well with other products.

Our Beauty Notes: ﻿This completely novel product feels incredible on skin creating the lightest application, that isn't necessarily a 'watery-y feeling' (as the coconut water ingredient implies), but rather feels like a thin cream. This penetrates the skin deeply for a lighter coverage of deep hydration and is an ideal everyday moisturizer for skin that may be thirsty, dry, sensitive or aging. 

 

Ingredients 

Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Juice*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Jojoba Esters, Theobroma Grandiflorum Seed Butter*, Propanediol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Xylitylglucoside, Cetearyl Glucoside, Citrullus Vulgaris (Watermelon) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Pulp Extract*, Lactic Acid, Alaria Esculenta Extract, Acacia Decurrens Flower Wax, Tocopherol, Sclerotium Gum, Xylitol, Polyglycerin-3, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Glyceryl Caprylate, Anhydroxylitol May Contain: Maltodextrin

*Ingredients from Organic Farming

entry.title: Le Baume
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jordan Seban Hair
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 38.00

Description

Brand Seen in StyleCaster

Le Baume ( French for The Balm ) is a lightweight conditioning leave-in treatment. The luxurious and rich velvet-cream texture melt in hands and once on the hair, it moisturizes, protects and repairs. The hair is soft, shiny and healthier.

The silicon-free and weightless formula is infused with L’Huile Signature oil blend, as well as Silk Proteins to strengthen, soften and tame frizz, all while protecting hair from damage.

Le Baume features ingredients from around the world, as well as a precise blend of essential oils, promoting natural hair growth. Gotu Kola extract, a plant from India, rich in minerals, replenish healthy shine and gloss.
Horsetail extract, rich in silica, helps bind Le Baume’s protein blend to the hair.
Aloe Vera, a natural conditioner, smooth the hair without a sticky residue.

Le Baume is applied on towel-dried hair before styling as a pre-blow dry lotion, as well as on dry hair, for touch-up.

Apply a peanut size amount on towel-dried hair, or more depending on the lengths. Proceed with blow-dry and heat styling. The hair is silky, shiny and hydrated. The style is locked-in and protected from heat damage and humidity.

OUR BEAUTY NOTES: Sister product to the original, and popular, L'Huile this offers a lightweight option for deeply effective conditioning, while being extremely lightweight on the hair. This includes the highly prized seven essentials, Jordan Seban signatures, leaving your hair nurtured and healthier than before. We appreciates its multi-use for damp or dry hair and even the skin. Jordan Seban never disappoints.

Size: 4.0oz

Ingredients

Aqua (Deionized Water), Carrageenan, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Organic Aloe), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Organic Argan Oil), Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil (Macadamia Nut Oil), Persea Gratissima Oil (Avocado Oil), Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (Organic Jojoba Oil), Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Shea Butter), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Sweet Almond Oil), Bursera Fagaroides Wood Oil (Linaloe), Citrus Aurantium Flower Oil (Neroli), Citrus Aurantium Leaf Oil (Neroli), Citrus Reticulata Peel Oil (Petitgrain), Amyris Balsamifera Bark Oil, Copaifera Species Resin Oils, Dipterocarpus Turbinatus Balsam Oil, Santalum Album Oil (Sandalwood), Santalum Spicata Wood Oil, Silk Protein Amino Acid Blend of Sodium Pca, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Foeniculum Vulgare Fruit Extract (Fennel), Centella Asiatica Extract (Organic Gotu Kola), Equisetum Arvense Extract (Horsetail), Geranium Maculatum Extract (Wild Geranium), Taraxacum Officinale Extract (Organic Dandelion), Hydroxyethyllcellulose*, Potassium Sorbate*, Sodium Benzoate*, Ethylhexylglycerin.*Plant Derived

On thinner hair, it gives body and hold the style. On thicker hair, it gives definition and eliminates frizz.

For a natural, effortless look, apply on wet hair and let the hair air dry. For curly hair, apply on tower-dried hair, and form curl with fingers. Dry with a diffuser or air dry.

Apply anytime on dry hair to refresh and nourish.Designed Paris, Made in the USA.

Mult-Tasking Specifics:

Use L'Huile as a pre-shampoo treatment: For very dry or thicker hair, pour a small amount (dime size or smaller) into your hands. Apply on lengths and ends, brush it through. For a lighter pre-shampoo treatment, mix a small amount with your favorite hair mask. The longer you let it sit, the deeper the restorative effect. Follow with your regular shampoo and conditioner.

Use L'Huile as a hair protection: L'Huile is the perfect natural hair protector. To protect your hair against the harsh effects of chlorinated pool water and sea salt, apply a small amount on hair before swimming. Acting as the hair natural protecting layer, apply a few drops of L'Huile on lengths and ends before coloring or highlighting your hair to lessen damage and breakage.

Use L'Huile on the skin: On skin, this restores moisture and radiance to the driest skin. In just a few minutes, L'Huile is naturally absorbed in to the skin, leaving behind a satin-soft finish. Massage a few drops directly on skin for maximum nourishing power. Combine L'Huile to your body cream, moisturizer to enhance and deepen the nourishing effect or as a cuticle treatment

entry.title: L'Huile
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jordan Seban Hair
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 48.00

Description

Brand Seen in StyleCaster

L'Huile for HAIR & SKIN

L'Huile (French for 'The Oil') is a unique blend of seven organic oils, combined at the perfect ratio to create the ultimate, multi-purpose nourishing treatment for the hair and skin. Selected for their moisturizing and varying penetrating properties, they work synergistically with one another to promote the optimal benefits to your hair and skin.

L'Huile oils are extracted without the use of any chemicals or solvents and most of them are cold-pressed. This delicate process preserves the oils' essential fatty acids, minerals and nutritional-rich properties, such as Vitamin A, B, & E, infusing the hair and skin with powerful antioxidant. L'Huile helps restor the natural hydro-lipid layer of the hair that has been damaged from years of styling, color treating and over processing. It deeply nourishes, softens and protects the driest hair. And because of its pure and concentrated formulation, a little goes a very long way.

Sourced from the most exclusive organic purveyors from around the world, including Morocco, Kenya, India, Israel and Mexico, their amazing natural aroma are brought out with a soupçon of Jordan's signature fragrance, creating the one-of-a-kind smell.

Designed Paris, Made in the USA.

OUR BEAUTY NOTES: Our promise is to align you with the best in luxury, non-toxic beauty - it's what we are all about. We couldn't wait to get our hands on this (now) favorite. This unique, luxurious hair & skin oil can be used as a pre-shampoo treatment to help manage dry, over processed hair, as an after cleansing routine, as a pre-pool or ocean treatment to protect hair from chlorine or sea salt and also on the skin as a deeply hydrating body oil moisturizer. The creator, Jordan Seban is a mastermind and we can't get enough! Use a small amount as this is one of the most powerfully hydrating oils we've come across - a little goes a long way. OUR TIP: Add to the bottom two inches of dry hair 'ends' or 'tips' before bed, sleep in it, and wash well in the morning to reveal incredibly hydrated and healthy hair.

Mult-Tasking Specifics:

Use L'Huile as a pre-shampoo treatment: For very dry or thicker hair, pour a small amount (dime size or smaller) into your hands. Apply on lengths and ends, brush it through. For a lighter pre-shampoo treatment, mix a small amount with your favorite hair mask. The longer you let it sit, the deeper the restorative effect. Follow with your regular shampoo and conditioner.

Use L'Huile as a hair protection: L'Huile is the perfect natural hair protector. To protect your hair against the harsh effects of chlorinated pool water and sea salt, apply a small amount on hair before swimming. Acting as the hair natural protecting layer, apply a few drops of L'Huile on lengths and ends before coloring or highlighting your hair to lessen damage and breakage.

Use L'Huile on the skin: On skin, this restores moisture and radiance to the driest skin. In just a few minutes, L'Huile is naturally absorbed in to the skin, leaving behind a satin-soft finish. Massage a few drops directly on skin for maximum nourishing power. Combine L'Huile to your body cream, moisturizer to enhance and deepen the nourishing effect or as a cuticle treatment 

 

 

Ingredients

1 Sweet Almond Oil * Prunus dulcis
Extracted exclusively from edible almonds, this luxuriously nutty oil is ultra-rich in Vitamin E and attributed to promoting overall hair and skin health.

2 Avocado Oil * Persea americana
Rich in saturated and mono-saturated fats, avocado oil easily penetrates the hair cuticle, providing support to and strengthening the hair fiber. Avocado oil is the perfect oil to help your hair retain moisture, as well as revive dry damaged hair from over styling and environmental wear and tear.

3 Jojoba Oil * Simmondsia chinensis
The properties of jojoba oil mimic that of sebum, the naturally occurring oil your skin and scalp produces. Jojoba oil acts as a hair protector, scalp moisturizer, and oil regulator.

4 Argan Oil * Argania spinosa
Also known as the Moroccan oil because of its origin, Argan oil is our multi-tasking miracle moisturizer that has been used for centuries for its unique benefits for the skin.

5 Macadamia Oil * Macadamia intergrifolia
Macadamia oil features one of the highest amount of omega-7 fatty acids compared to other nut oil, providing exceptional nourishment for the skin.

6 Shea Nut Oil * Vittellaria paradoxa
Light in texture and carefully extracted from Shea butter, Shea nut oil is more rare and features lighter, highly concentrated moisturizing properties than its well-known butter counterpart.

7 Safflower Oil * Carthamus tinctorius
Safflower oil features high amounts of oleic acid, making it light and easy to penetrate hair and skin.

Fragrance is derived from a blend of organic essential oils Neroli and Orange Blossom.

entry.title: Swiss Apple Facial Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Skincare
Price: 130.00

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More 

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

A revolutionary anti-aging serum designed to even the skin tone, reduce wrinkles, and preserve a youthful appearance. Formulated with the stem cells of a rare Swiss apple, this combination of rich proteins, phytonutrients, and metabolites boosts cell production and protects your skin from environmental stress.

Our Beauty Notes: An aggressive merriment of skin preserving ingredients created to address signs of dullness, environmental stressers fine lines and wrinkles. This facial serum with it's gel-like consistency tightens skin as it dries offering a unique list of powerful ingredients that help to turnover skin into a brighter, younger and healthier looking version. Especially important during the PM regimen.

Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

Ingredients 

Seaweed Extract, Purified Water, Hyaluronic Acid, Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Phenoxyethanol*, Ethylhexylglycerin* *Derived from natural sources.

Use

Apply 2 or 3 drops of serum to face and throat after cleansing day and night. Use on its own or apply underneath moisturizer; allow 5 minutes absorption time before applying makeup and 15 minutes absorption time before applying sunscreen. For external use only.

entry.title: CoQ-10 Toner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Skincare
Price: 32.00

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More 

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

An alcohol free, skin-balancing toner formulated with the powerful antioxidant CoQ-10. The hydrating and refreshing mixture helps close pores and balance the skin's pH level using Aloe Vera and Hyaluronic Acid to enhance younger, more vibrant, and even-toned skin. 

Our Beauty Notes: Toners are an essential part of your skincare regime for revived and balanced skin, this helps to restore your skins unique and personal pH without the burning of alcohol. Plus, this 4 ounce bottle can last up to 6 months deepening on daily use. 

Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

Ingredients 

Purified Water, Decyl Glucoside (Veg. Oils & Sugar), Disodium Coco-Glucoside Citrate, Coco Glucoside Oleaste (Coconut and Sunflower Oil), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein*, Xanthan Gum, Fragaria Chiloensis Seed Oil (Strawberry), Lycopene, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexylglycerin (both derived from natural sources).  *Note: contains gluten. 

Use

Apply a small amount of cleanser to wet face. Use with a wet cotton pad to remove eye makeup. Rinse completely with water. Follow with toner and moisturizer. For external use only.

entry.title: Unscented Body Lotion
entry.summary:
Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 22.00

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More 

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine

A hydrating, skin-softening body lotion formulated with an emollient blend of shea butter, calendula oil, and jojoba oil. Unscented for extra sensitive skin.

    Our Beauty Notes: Perfect everyday body lotion for all skin types, especially very sensitive skin. 

    Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

    Ingredients 

    Purified Water (aqua), Glycerine (from Coconut Oil), Stearic Acid (from Coconut Oil), Cetearyl Alcohol (from Palm Oil), Myristyl Myristate (fatty acid), Glycerol Monostearate, Glycine Joja (Soybean) Oil, Simmondsia Chinesis (Jojoba) Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Calendula Officinalis Flower (Calendula) Oil, Cymbopogon Citratus (Lemongrass) Oil, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexyglycerin both derived from natural sources

    Use

    Use lotion daily to soften, smooth, and hydrate. For best results, massage product onto slightly damp skin just after bathing to seal in moisture. For external use only.

entry.title: COCONUT NAIL & CUTICLE THERAPY
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aila Cosmetics
Type: Nail Polish
Price: 19.00

Description 

PLEASE NOTE: BACK ORDERED WITH BRAND. ALL PRE-ORDERS TO SHIP IMMEDIATELY ONCE BACK IN. THANK YOU FOR YOUR PATIENCE!

This 100% Natural and Organic Coconut Oil cleans, hydrates, and strengthens nails & cuticles. It also performs as a powerful antioxidant, offering effective anti-aging protection. The coconut oil has been extracted using an innovative extraction process that allows for greater preservation of lauric acid than normal cold-pressed techniques, while most coconut oils test within the range of 46-49 percent lauric acid content, this contains 57 percent with an additional 70 percent content of medium chain fatty acids. The high levels of lauric acid in addition to caprylic and capric acids within coconut oil allows for greater anti-microbial and anti-fungal performance aiding in the prevention of bacterial growthin nails as well as providing luxurious hydration. The combination of these naturally occurring acids gently nourish and sooth nails & cuticles.  

  • Gluten-Free, Vegan
  • 100% Organic
  • Made WITHOUT Parabens or Phylates
  • Cruelty Free
  • Made in the USA

Our Beauty Notes: We always remember our nail polish, but our hands and cuticles don't get that same love, they're the last beauty thought to most. Yet, they help give an overall healthy look to young hands. For the busy man or woman this cuticle healer is the ideal daily treatment to encourage proper hydration and younger looking hands. 

 

Ingredients:

entry.title: Easy Does It Balancing Gel Cleanser
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Skincare
Price: 29.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN: 

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour & More

It turns out a little cleansing goes a lot farther than you think. Often times, our best efforts at clear pores clear out our skin’s natural defenses, too. With a unique combination of organic Chilean soap bark, cold-pressed apple oil and vegetable glycerin, Easy Does It lathers into a soothing, non-drying foam that cleans, softens and helps to protect face, body and hair. That’s right. Turns out those 17 different soaps and shampoos aren’t necessary after all.

Our Beauty Notes: Effective, gentle, non-drying (and non-toxic) cleansers that create suds safely are hard to come by, which is one of many reasons we can’t seem to put this down. The glycerin is an organic compound that works to address everything from acne scars, blackheads and large pores to hydration and signs of aging.  When married with the Chilean soap bark and cold-pressed apple oil this works to balance your skins pH. Pairs perfectly with One Love Organics Cleansing Heart Sponge to clean deeper, tackle unique face crevices and to ensure makeup removal. OUR TIP: Can also be used as a family shampoo and body wash thanks to its gentle nature. 

Directions

Massage onto damp skin using gentle, circular motions. Rinse thoroughly.

Ingredients 

Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Sodium Coco-Glucoside Tartrate, Sodium Hydroxypropylsulfonate Laurylglucoside Crosspolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Hydrolyzed Amaranth Protein, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Lauryl Glucoside, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Oil, Quillaja Saponaria Bark Extract, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sodium Hydroxypropylsulfonate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Lauryl Glucose Carboxylate, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract

entry.title: Coconut + Salt MINERAL BODY LOTION
entry.summary:
Vendor: One Love Organics
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 25.00

Description

AWARD WINNING BRAND SEEN IN:

InStyle, Vogue, ELLE, Allure, Glamour, Refinery29 & More

Coconut + Salt Mineral Body Lotion is uniquely formulated with organic, virgin coconut oil, prized for its skin conditioning properties, and mineral rich Atlantic Sea salt, a natural humectant, to help attract and retain water from the air for enhanced skin hydration. Its fresh, clean scent comes from organic aloe, coconut oil and sun-dried Atlantic Sea salt, with no added fragrance. Lush yet lightweight, this mineral rich elixir can be used alone or layered with your favorite body oil to create the perfect amount of moisture for any season, climate or skin type. 

Size: 3.3 oz

Our Beauty Notes: Believe the hype. This light, non-greasy lotion has a light aroma that's perfect for everyday wear. We love marrying this body lotion with body serum before bed for an extra oomph in deep hydration.  

Directions 

Apply all over the body after a shower, bath or anytime moisture is needed. 

Ingredients

SKIN LOVING SUPERSTARS

Raw, Organic Virgin Coconut Oil: An excellent emollient rich in nutrients and antioxidants to condition skin.

Moisturizing Sugar Complex: A hyaluronic acid booster that helps to limit water loss for increased hydration.

Organic Aloe Leaf Juice: A natural source of salicylic acid, aloe vera is perfect to help keep skin clear and bright.

Pure Atlantic Sea Salt: a natural humectant, to help attract and retain water from the air for enhanced skin hydration. Sea Salt also delivers a treasure trove of minerals and vital nutrients to nourish and revitalize.

aloe barbadensis leaf juice*, cocos nucifera (coconut) oil*, capric/caprylic triglyceride,
hydroxystearyl alcohol and hydroxystearyl glucoside, cetearyl alcohol, xylitylglucoside (and) anhydroxylitol(and) xylitol, sodium chloride, acacia senegal gum (and) xantham gum, dehydroacetic acid (and) benzyl alcohol

*Ingredients from Organic Farming/les ingrédients biologiques

entry.title: Violet
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGB Cosmetics
Type: Makeup
Price: 13.50

Description

Sophisticated purple. 

 Cremé; apply 2 fine coats for opaque coverage

- Five Free: No Formaldehyde, No Toluene, NO DBP, No Formaldehyde Resin, No Camphor
- Made in the USA  
- Cruelty Free  
- Vegan  
- Gluten-Free

    Our Beauty Notes: The perfect sophisticated purple. 

    Use

    Always use a base coat, two coats of color and finish with a top coat.

This new summer inspired shade has us longing for the beach.

- 8 Free
- Gluten-Free
- Vegan
- Made without Parabens

- Chip-resistant, super shiny, long-lasting
- Made in the USA

entry.title: Hydro-distilled Sage & Rose Body Wash
entry.summary:
Vendor: Strange Invisible Perfumes
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 45.00

Description

Brand Seen In: ELLE, British Vogue, Harper's Bazaar & More

A remarkably pure cleansing formula for all skin types made with certified organic, non-photosensitizing ingredients, including hydro-distilled sage and Turkish rose.

- Made with purified glacier water and natural, certified organic/wildcrafted ingredients
- Completely non-toxic, vegan, and never tested on animals
- 8 fl oz. 

      Our Beauty Notes: The perfect cleansing accompaniment to the Strange Invisible Perfume Body Lotions. We appreciate their incredible approach to quality body care, as a luxury perfumery based in Venice, California you won't find a purer, sexier or higher-end way to start your day or amp up your evenings. 

      Use 

      Apply to clean, dry skin. Works best with Hydro-distilled Lavender & Vetiver Body Wash. 

      Ingredients 
      Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil*, Persae Gratissima (Avocado) Oil**, Anthemis Nobilis (Chamomile) Flower Extract*, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rose Hip) Seed Extract*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Extract*, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Extract*, Tagetes Erecta (Marigold) Flower Extract*, Arctium Lappa (Burdock) Root Extract*, Rosmarinus Offi cinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract*, Ceratonia Siliqua (Locust Bean) Gum*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil*, Glyceryl Stearate1, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice*, Xanthan Gum, Glycerin*, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil*, Rosa Mosqueta (Rose Hip) Seed Oil*, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Rose Geranium) Oil*, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Oil*, Salvia Offi cinalis (Sage) Oil*, Cymbopogon Martinii (Palmarosa) Oil*, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Hydroxymethylglycinate2, Retinyl Palmitate (Vitamin A), Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Oil, Trifolium Pratense (Clover) Flower Oil***
      *Certified Organic **Certified Biodynamic ***Wildcrafted

entry.title: Moonlight Catalyst
entry.summary:
Vendor: KYPRIS
Type: Skincare
Price: 77.00

Description 

As Seen In: InStyle & Green Product Company of the Year, 2014

This nighttime treatment is a gentle, yet effective way to refine and lightly exfoliate skin while you sleep that delivers all the cosmetic benefits of retinoid preparations without any harsh chemicals, redness, peeling, or thinning of skin.

For most skin types especially beneficial for environmentally stressed, experienced, or imbalanced complexions. 

KYPRIS is a luxurious line of holistic, high-performance skin care boasting organic, wild crafted, and sustainably grown botanicals for gorgeous skin and an ecstatic experience of your unique Beauty. 

Soft and smooth.

Our Beauty Notes: Our favorite part? The supercritical extractions of Rosehip Seed and Sea Buckthorn Fruit that deliver all the valuable essential fatty acids and phytonutrients to care for irritated or chapped skin. This is essential when working to replace or find a nighttime retinoid that doesn't come with harsh chemicals - you get all the same benefits but none of the peeling and extreme irritation and this helps soothe over processed skin all while its exfoliating.  

*Kypris may not be used with coupon codes per requested by brand and honored by their global partners due to the highest quality of sourcing.*

Use

ONLY at night by itself or in combination with other KYPRIS products. 

Apply 1 to 2 droppers full of serum to a clean face and décolleté. Apply other serums and elixir as desired. In the morning, cleanse applied-to areas. Moonlight Catalyst must not be worn during the day or in conjunction with other products or prescriptions which increase exfoliation as this may cause irritation. For external use only.

 
Ingredients

16 Active Natural Ingredients 

  * More effective yet less irritating than AHAs, Fermented Pumpkin Enzymes softens skin and decreases the appearance of environmental overexposure and inflammatory lifestyle via a refining exfoliation action. 

 * Nutrient, vitamin, and antioxidant-rich Hawaiian Sea Algae deeply hydrates the skin to replenish its moisture balance without clogging pores.  

 * Xylitylglucosides are deeply hydrating precursors to skin’s natural creation of hyaluronic acid for beautifully hydrated skin. 

 * Supercritical extractions of Rosehip Seed and Sea Buckthorn Fruit deliver all the valuable essential fatty acids and phytonutrients to care for irritated or chapped skin.  

What's different?

Kypris added the following...

Biomimetic Epidermal Growth Factor (EGF)- This beautiful peptide is created via synthesis to mimic the renewing benefits of your skin's naturally occurring EGF.

A unique peach extract with greater hydration properties than before to compliment the benefits of our proprietary blend of algae extracts for beautifully hydrated skin. 

Organic Neroli Flower Extract - Soothing to skin and nerves alike, we included a gorgeous, subtle extract of organic bitter orange blossoms.

Water/Aqua, Glycerin, Lactobacillus/Pumpkin Fruit Ferment Filtrate, Xylitylglucoside, Sclerotium Gum, Algae, Anhydroxylitol, Xylitol, sh-Oligopeptide-1,  Prunus Persica (Peach) Fruit Extract, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Flower Extract, Vigna Aconitifolia Seed Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Extract, Prunus Domestica (Plum) Fruit Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Water Extract, Hydrolyzed Fucus Vesiculosus Protein, Sodium Chloride, Trehalose,  Sodium Levulinate, Maltodextrin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Anisate, Sodium Citrate

  •

entry.title: Glow Philtre
entry.summary:
Vendor: KYPRIS
Type: Skincare
Price: 88.00

Description 

Brand Seen In: InStyle & Green Product Company of the Year, 2014

Kypris creates a treatment mask blending refined pomegranate pith enzymes, softening thalassic extracts of sea fennel stem cells & sea algae with ultra hydrating silver ear mushroom to revitalize skin’s surface. Use as a hydrating exfoliation pre-makeup or as a weekly indulgence to maintain clear pores, smooth texture, and a vibrant luminosity.

Benefits 

Gentle, efficient exfoliation *  Smooths skin for  makeup application prep  *  Softens skin * Clears pores * Sloughs outermost layer of skin for better product penetration * Brightens *  Imparts vibrant glow


OUR BEAUTY NOTES: When it comes to sourcing local, wildcrafted, sustainable and clinically effective ingredients Kypris is among the best. So when they introduced masks to their intelligent line-up we literally lept with anticipation - and they did not dissapoint. This masks has us completely swooning and using it weekly before applying makeup. The luminous skin that accompanies after use is beautiful and extra bonus points for exfoliating and keeping breakouts at bay.  

*Kypris may not be used with coupon codes per requested by brand and honored by their global partners due to the highest quality of sourcing.*

Use

Apply a thin layer of Glow Philtre to a clean face and neck avoiding the eye area. Leave on skin for up to 20 minutes, if sensitive up to 5 minutes. Massage as you rinse with a facial mitt or wash cloth. Follow with a gentle cleanse. Use up to three times per week to prep skin for makeup application or to encourage renewal, clear pores, soft texture, and luminosity. Stop use if irritation occurs. For external use only.

Size: 46 mL
 
Ingredients

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS

POMEGRANATEFermented from pomegranate pith, enzymes gently encourage renewal

GARDEN OF SEA VEGETABLESThalasso therapy returns us to our primordial home in the water to revitalize our spirit and to calm, soothe, plump, brighten, and soften skin

SILVER EARA seemingly magical mushroom holds hundreds of times its weight in water to drench & hydrate even the most parched skin 

CERAMIDESLipid molecules nourish, revive, & soothe chapped complexions

NEROLI FLOWER A delicate floral indulgence to soften skin and romance your senses

 ALL INGREDIENTS 

Water/Aqua, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Glycerin, Hydrolyzed Fucus Vesiculosus Protein, Coconut Alkanes, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Moringa Glucoside, Xylitylglucoside, Sclerotium Gum, Algae, Anhydroxylitol, Sodium PCA, Xylitol, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Eryngium Maritimum Callus Culture Filtrate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Plankton Extract, Ceramide 3, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Extract, Citric Acid

entry.title: Clearing Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: KYPRIS
Type: Skincare
Price: 67.00

Description 

As Seen In: InStyle & Green Product Company of the Year, 2014

Support skin’s inherent healing capabilities to minimize the appearance of irritations and blemishes. For most skin types especially beneficial for fussy, pollution-irritated, or hormonally wonky complexions. 

KYPRIS is a luxurious line of holistic, high-performance skin care boasting organic, wild crafted, and sustainably grown botanicals for gorgeous skin and an ecstatic experience of your unique Beauty. 

Our Beauty Notes: Typical acne fighting treatments dehydrate the skin actually causing skin to overcompensate creating more oil (sebum), and therefore more acne. Lovely. How this serum avoids that is through using Zinc and other powerful blends that aggressively fight acne-causing bacteria - old and new - without stripping the skin of essential moisture. 

*Kypris may not be used with coupon codes per requested by brand and honored by their global partners due to the highest quality of sourcing.*

Use

After cleansing and before moisturizing, apply Clearing Serum to affected skin carefully avoiding eye area. Other KYPRIS products may also be applied. For external use only.

 
Ingredients

30 ACTIVE NATURAL INGREDIENTS

Quinoa The Incan ‘mother grain’ proffers a wealth of vitamin E and 8 essential amino acids to soothe and nourish even the most upset skin into balance. Our quinoa oil comes from small, pesticide-free farms that cold press this prized botanical. 

Zinc  A clinically studied mineral friend of your skin’s immune system, zinc, balances your complexion while supporting its natural abilities to heal.

Lilac Leaf Stem Cells A clinically proven, highly sustainable source of verbascoside, a worthy foe to blemishes, inflammation, hyper pigmentation, and sebum over production.

Green Tea Provides an antioxidant burst of EGCG and polyphenols to soothe redness.

Asiaticoside The active saponin of Centella asiatica lovingly supports skin’s connective tissues to diminish the appearances of current and past blemishes.

Chaparral One of the oldest living plants native to the desert, yields a potent extract wealthy in botanical wisdom and lignans that impart an antioxidant-like effect to irritated skin.

Tea Tree & Lavender A proprietary blend of balancing, calming essential oils to minimize the appearance of inflammation and challenge the pesky occurrences of blemishes.

What's Different? 

Kypris added the following....  

* Quinoa Seed Oil - We added this essential amino acid-rich plant oil to better nourish compromised skin. 

* Lilac Leaf Stem Cells - One of the genius aspects of some plant stem cells is the ability to offer a valuable constituent that is propagated from a single cell. A rich source of verbascoside, the lilac leaf stem cells benefit skin that is break out prone or recovering from break outs, old and new.

* Chaparral - Plant wisdom from a desert shrub that thrives in the most inhospitable environments and lives longer than most plants on earth has some serious botanical smarts to proffer. Our wild crafted chaparral was traditionally used as an herbal aid for those suffering from cancer and other inflammatory conditions. It's viewed ethnobotanically as an ancient antibiotic, and modernity has discovered its lignans to have an antioxidant-like effect, hence its calming benefits to skin.

* Asiaticoside - Instead of using a complete extract of Centella asiatica, we reached for the clinically studied, active saponin of the herb: asiaticocide, shown to be even more supportive of skin's connective tissues.

* Montmorillonite - A fairy dusting of this super soothing clay helps skin to maintain a happy balance of sebum which in turn limits the food supply of undesirable bacteria. 

Water/Aqua, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Oil, Glycerin, Zinc PCA, Syringa Vulgaris (Lilac) Leaf Cell Culture Extract, Camellia Oleifera (Green Tea) Leaf Extract, Sarcosine, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Phospholipids, Larrea Tridentata (Chaparral) Extract, Asiaticoside, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Phragmites Communis Extract, Poria Cocos Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Montmorillonite,  Sclerotium Gum, Tocopherol, Allantoin, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil,  Phytosterols, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Lecithin, Squalane,  Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ceramide NP, Sodium Levulinate, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Maltodextrin, Sodium Anisate, Limonene, Linalool

entry.title: Antioxidant Dew
entry.summary:
Vendor: KYPRIS
Type: Skincare
Price: 72.00

Description 

As Seen In: InStyle Magazine 

BACKORDERED WITH BRAND: EXPECTED BACK IN STOCK EARLY DECEMBER. ALL PRE-ORDERS TO SHIP IMMEDIATELY ONCE BACK IN. THANK YOU FOR YOUR PATIENCE!

The Antioxidant Dew gives deep hydration with ultralight texture to restore strength, vitality, and radiance to the skin with three distinct forms of antioxidants and a host of nourishing botanical Love. May be used as a lightweight multi action moisturizer or as a potent layering piece in your skin care wardrobe. Suitable for most skin types. 

Especially beneficial for environmentally stressed, experienced, or imbalanced complexions, designed for all skin types. 

Green Product Company of the Year, 2014 KYPRIS is a luxurious line of holistic, high-performance skin care boasting organic, wild crafted, and sustainably grown botanicals for gorgeous skin and an ecstatic experience of your unique Beauty.  

Our Beauty Notes: Antioxidants are critical for skin, just like for the body, at protecting the skin from free radicals, addressing scars, firming and tackling wrinkles - and possibly the best part - fighting inflammation by increasing circulation and cell metabolism. We wear this after our serum and before our sunscreen as a light moisturizer. 

*Kypris may not be used with coupon codes per requested and honored by their global partners due to the highest quality of sourcing.*

Use

Apply 1 to 2 droppers full of serum to a clean face and décolleté morning and night. For best results follow with other KYPRIS Serums and an Elixir. For external use only.

 
Ingredients

Water/Aqua, Glycerin, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Xylitylglucoside, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Algae, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Phospholipids, Phragmites Communis (Reed) Extract, Symphytum Officinale (Comfrey) Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Extract, Poria Cocos Extract, Xylitol, Anhydroxylitol, Waltheria Indica Leaf Extract, Panthenol, Rosa Damascena Flower Extract, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Calophyllum Inophylum (Tamanu) Seed Oil, Lecithin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Superoxide Dismutase, Ferulic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Mannitol, Dextrin, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sodium Anisate, Sodium Levulinate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Gluconate, Xanthan Gum

 26 Active Natural Ingredients 

  * Antioxidants Galore Vitamins C & E and Superoxide Dismutase encapsulated in phospholipids combine with Ferulic Acid and an array of herb-derived antioxidants to challenge free radicals and to nourish your skin barrier. 

 * Sea Algae Extracts studied for their impressive abilities to hydrate skin without overwhelming pores for supple, deliciously hydrated skin.  

 * Xylitylglucosides are deeply hydrating precursors to skin’s natural creation of hyaluronic acid for beautifully hydrated skin. 

 * Rose Extracts known for centuries as soothing & toning agents, two distinct varietals of heirloom roses deliver calm and resilience.  

 * Reed Extract A common soothing herb in Chinese medicine imparts its botanical wisdom for a calmed complexion.  

 * Tamanu One of the most active and healing plant oils known for its ability to repair the appearance of past blemishes and inspire cellular renewal.  

 * Waltheria indica A botanical gem from the Mallow family is known to brighten the appearance of dull skin and to calm redness.  

 * Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline (DPHP) A botanically derived amino acid to complement Vitamin C and support skin's collagen. 

What's different?

Kypris removed the Wheat Germ Oil, so the product is definitely gluten free. 

They added the following...

Ferulic Acid - We just couldn't resist adding this antioxidant gem to our liposome encapsulated vitamin C & E and superoxide dismutase. Ferulic acid is another super stable antioxidant that combats free radical formation which when unchecked can cause all kinds of damage to tissues.

Reed Extract - A beloved sea vegetable that is commonly used in Chinese medicine to release heat or calm irritations.

Waltheria indica - An herb from the mallow family that also helps to calm skin.

DPHP - Dipalmitoyl Hydroxy Proline. This was in the Antioxidant Dew before, but we increased the concentration of this gem.

entry.title: Body Elixir - Inflorescence
entry.summary:
Vendor: KYPRIS
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 95.00

Description 

Green Product Company of the Year: 2014, As Seen In: Well+GOOD & More

Bursting with the essence of bitter orange blossoms flowering in Spring, Inflorescence Body Elixir infuses clinically proven actives such as skin-plumping Sweet Iris Stem Cells & Vitamin C Ester into a blend of sustainably procured, phytonutrient-rich botanical oils. Sunflower, Moringa, Prickly Pear, & Tamanu seed oils combine to create the sensation of deliciously moisturized, ecstatically touchable, bare skin. 

KYPRIS Body Elixir: Inflorescence is a non-greasy, multi-active body oil produced with clinically proven actives typically reserved for facial care and 12 of the most potent and nourishing organic, wild crafted, and co-op grown botanicals blended.

Benefits: Enhances elasticity * Softens, tones, and boosts luminosity * Soothes dryness * Provides an antioxidant boost to SPF * Diminishes the appearance of sun-overexposure * Protects and inspires collagen production * Protects and inspires collagen production * Organic, sun-safe aromatherapy 

For: Most skin types

Size: 100 mL

Our Beauty Notes: Favorite part of this luxurious body serum? That it's ingredients are typically ones reserved for the face, which translates to fighting your body's skin aging through the encouragement of collagen production and softening and toning the skin, plumping up body skin to appear young and youthful and incredibly hydrated. 

*Kypris may not be used with coupon codes per requested by brand and honored by their global partners due to the highest quality of sourcing.*

Use

Use: As desired... Day and Night. By itself or under SPF.

Directions: Apply a small puddle of Body Elixir to your skin beginning at your extremities and massage towards your heart. Enjoy the delicious sensation of your hands touching your beautiful skin. For external use only.

If you are pregnant, nursing, or have any health conditions, please consult a physician prior to use.

 * Please note we do not accept returns of open products. All returned, unopened product will be subject to a restocking fee and return shipping. 

 

Ingredients

Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera (Moringa) Seed Oil, Calophyllum Inophylum (Tamanu) Seed Oil, Opuntia Engelmanii (Prickly Pear) Seed Oil, Trichilia Emetica (Mafura) Seed Butter, Iris Pallida (Sweet Iris) Leaf Cell Extract, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Citrus Sinesis (Orange) Peel Extract, Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Tocopherol (Non GMO), Citric Acid 

* 12 Active Natural Ingredients 

  * Neroli & Sweet Orange: Sun-safe, uplifting fruit and flower essential oils kiss skin with the magic of an eternal Spring’s Inflorescence. 

 * Iris Stem Cells & Vitamin C Ester:  Created with the best green technologies to inspire and protect collagen and to plump skin to a vibrant luminosity. 

 * Moringa: A wealth of vitamins, nutrients, and fatty acids from the kernels of a miraculous tree that flourishes even in drought to soothe and nourish stubborn dry skin. // KYPRIS’s moringa kernel oil is from a co-operative effort that uses the leaves for hunger relief and the kernels for the oil. A wealth of vitamins, nutrients, and fatty acids from the kernels of this miraculous tree that flourishes even in drought soothes and nourishes stubborn, dry skin. The kernels can be used to regrow the trees but so can clippings of the leaves. The kernels can clarify water but not purify water to an extent that it is potable, so they are best used for their nourishing oil which is not traditionally consumed. The Moringa Kernel oil in this product benefits Trees for Life in Nicaragua. 

 * Sunflower: Local, organic blooms yield a golden seed oil wealthy in sun-protective beta-carotene and an auspicious fatty acid composition for a delicate emollience.

 * Tamanu: Organically grown and pressed by a co-operative, KYPRIS's Tamanu oil inspires cellular renewal, is used in France to help soothe burned skin, and is fantastic for enhancing the elasticity of pregnant bellies.

 * Prickly Pear: Wild crafted from the Arizona high desert and the result of a 3+ year collaboration with a wild crafting group, our organic, wild crafted Prickly Pear seed oil is a unique wealth of amino acids and vitamin E that soothes stressed and tired skin.
